alert.note: Alert for Central Aleutians (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 12 at 10:13AM AKDT until October 12 at 5:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM AKDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 50 to 65 mph with gusts up to 80 mph. Isolated gusts to 100 mph possible for Adak. * WHERE...Central Aleutians, including Adak and Atka. * WHEN...Until 5 PM AKDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property, and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will peak between 6am and Noon today, then begin to slowly diminish this afternoon.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Prepare for the possibility of widespread power outages. Use caution if you must drive.
